attributes.action: Pay attention to and comment upon e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst this e-petition service is a good idea to further out democracy, it is stunted because often nothing comes of even the most popular petitions. We petition the Prime Minister to leave public comment and statement on all petitions exceeding a certain popularity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
